about_the_game:
GamePlay

There is a place called Apaku. In this strange land, people worship stockings as if they were sacred items.
You have always been interested in stockings and are intrigued by this mysterious place.
You decided to visit Apaku for yourself, hoping to see these holy stockings...
Who will you meet there...?

Story Background

There is a place called Apaku. In this strange land, people worship stockings as if they were sacred items.
You have always been interested in stockings and is intrigued by this mysterious place.
You decided to visit Apaku for himself, hoping to learn more about it.
What will happen there?

Characters

Shizuku:

Shizuku is very welcoming towards visitors from outside Apaku. She often takes them under her wing to show them around the city while sharing stories about the Stockings Deities.

Mion:

A shy girl who started wearing stockings after being inspired by the story of "the beauty bestowed by the God of Stockings".
Because of this, she became a shrine maiden at the Stockings Shrine.

Aoiba:

The daughter of Apaku's most prominent family, Aoi wears intricate lace stockings that reflect her status within society.

Features

  • 20 sexy and erotic images of beautiful girls.
  • A fantastical erotic story with girls who have unique personalities.
  • You can skip the puzzles if you just want to enjoy the story. (Press Enter during a puzzle).
  • CG Gallery mode. (Click the left and right buttons next to the CG after completing a puzzle).

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains a large amount of extremely sexual content.
It may not be appropriate for all audiences.
Please make your own judgment before playing the game whether you meet the requirements for playing such games.
The story is purely fictional.
All characters appearing in this game are adults over 18 years old.
